de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.textobjects

Interface IActionCodes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEmailCompact
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILetterView

    public interface IActionCodes
extends IEmailCompact
    Describes the panels into that the TextObjects are to be inserted.
